name: Tanks: The Game
description:
This game was inspired by what I remembered from the Atari game Combat (1977). Clearly, I remembered it poorly but it serves as a prototype and learning experience in my journey into Game Development. Please enjoy the game. Comment if you like it and if you would like to see a much bigger game with similar mechanics. I would love to hear feedback on the feel of the game and anything you liked or disliked.  And tell everyone your High Score. Mine is 10,700. 

You move with the arrows or WASD. Aim your turret with Q and E. And enemies become harder as you progress. Good luck!
